channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta’s accused of violating European antitrust rules. What the dispute is all about.
item.description: The European Commission on Thursday accused Meta Platforms of violating antitrust rules, in the latest salvo by European regulators against American t...

item.title: Strategist who nailed stocks, bonds and oil this year warns of ‘optimism shakeout’ in early 2026
item.description: Look for more AI adoption to help broaden the stock market next year, but overly optimistic sentiment may need a reset early on, says strategist Warre...

item.title: ‘She’s young enough to be his granddaughter’: My dad, 85, is being seduced by his caregiver. What can I do?
item.description: “He is of sound mind, but he might succumb to someone who offers him companionship.”

item.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
item.description: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

item.title: Bitcoin could reach $170,000 if it trades like gold, says JPMorgan strategist
item.description: Bitcoin could trade as high as $170,000 if investors were to value it like gold, according to a JPMorgan strategist.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
